name: Garth the Giant
long_description: The barkeep is a giant of a man. He stands nearly seven feet tall and looks as though he might have a bit of ogre blood in him. He wears a pair of iron armbands and a leather tunic. The tavern's patrons seem to reguard him with respect if not fear.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome! What can I get you to drink?
dialogue.default: We serve the finest ale and spirits this side of the mountains.
